text:
NeuroFlow | Backend Engineer | DevOps Engineer | Mobile Engineer | Philadelphia, PA | $70,000 - 110,000 | 0.0 - 0.75% Equity | Full-time | Onsite | https://www.neuroflowsolution.com/

Health care providers are our heroes. They’re responsible for helping those who need it most, which can be a tough challenge when patients struggle with mental health conditions, often resulting in poor engagement, motivation, and treatment compliance.

NeuroFlow promotes behavioral health access and engagement in all care settings to improve outcomes, overall wellness, and cost of care. Our suite of tools enables remote monitoring and behavioral health integration across the continuum of care, including psychology, primary care, and pain management settings.

NeuroFlow’s mission is to be a resource and asset to health care providers in their tireless pursuit to help patients feel better faster.

See the full job descriptions and apply here: https://angel.co/neuroflow/jobs/
